pkgmetadata.longdescription: Variable Life Adjusted Display // Contains functions to set up risk-adjusted quality control charts in health care. For the variable life adjusted display (VLAD) proposed by Lovegrove et al. (1997) doi:10.1016/S0140-6736(97)06507-0 and the risk- adjusted cumulative sum chart based on log-likelihood ratio statistic introduced by Steiner et al. (2000) doi:10.1093/biostatistics/1.4.441 the average run length and control limits can be computed.
